name: Strategy Miner v1.1
description:
This game was originally submitted to Brackeys game jam. Re-uploaded with improvements.

Develop your strategy and shoot for the highest score before you run out of oxygen.

  • Every floor has a hidden ladder that will take you deeper and deeper into the mines.
  • Coins are more abundant in the early levels and can be used for useful shop items.
  • Goblets and Crowns are worth tons of points but are more abundant at lower levels.
